original_text: And as Paul was to be led into the castle, he said unto the chief captain, May I speak unto thee? Who said, Canst thou speak Greek?
korean_text: 바울을 데리고 영내로 들어가려 할 그 때에 바울이 천부장에게 이르되 내가 당신에게 말할 수 있느냐 이르되 네가 헬라 말을 아느냐

sentences.original_text: And as Paul was to be led into the castle
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바울이 성으로 이끌려 가려 할 때

sentences.original_text: he said unto the chief captain
